summary: This bill, the SBIR/STTR Application Assistance Act, aims to support small businesses applying for Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. It extends the FAST program and mandates the Small Business Administration to provide assistance to businesses, especially those in states with lower SBIR/STTR award rates.  The bill also focuses on increasing participation from minority institutions and Hispanic-serving institutions in both SBIR and STTR programs through enhanced outreach efforts.
